Utterance: 1: Ami mone kori ami swasthokor khete chai.
2: Ami fast food sampurnovabe bad dite chai. Ami aro set khabar khete chai, ar ami shudhu swasthokor khabar khete chai. Thik ache.
3: Ami mone kori amar onnoto mudikhanay jaoa dorkar. Thik ache.
4: Eta ki emon kichu ja apni korchen na?
5: Na, idaning noy. Ami sbematro kormoshshetre khabar khachchi, ba barir pothe fast food-er moddhe diye jachchi. Thik ache.
6: Jemon, amar kache jaoar shakti ba ichcha chilo na, ar ami bacchar jonno ortho sanchay korar jonno onek chesta kore jachchi. Samay khunje paoya kothin hote pare. Thik ache,
7: Ami proti saptahe robibar jetam. Ar jaoar age amar mone ekta talika chilo,
8: Eti sombhobot amar jaoar sombhabona aro badhaye tulbe. Sedin bikel porjonto amake kaje thakte hobe na. Tai ami hoyto ghumiye jete pari ar ektu ektu kore hoyto robibar sakal 10-tar moto.

9: Thik ache, idaning jekhane ami emon kichu korte chai na ja amar sotyiyi kora dorkar, ami nijeke ekti puraskar deb. Ar ami jani je pothe ei durdanto bakery ache. Tai jodi ami nijeke boli, ami jodi mudikhanay jai, tobey ami barir pothe bakery-te thame pari, tobey amar jaoar sombhabona beshi hote pare.
